title: Commission Regulation ( EEC ) No 258/92 of 3 February 1992 fixing for the 1992 marketing year the reference prices for cucumbers
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 258/92  of 3 February 1992  fixing for the 1992 marketing year the reference prices for cucumbers
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. For the 1992 marketing year, the reference prices for cucumbers (CN code 0707 00 11, 19), expressed in ecus per 100 kilograms net of packed products of class I, of all sizes, shall be as follows:
- February (from 11 to 20): 144,61
(from 21 to 29): 122,42
- March: 112,14
- April: 92,76
- May: 76,12
- June: 63,76
- July: 48,28
- August: 48,65
- September: 57,62
- from 1 October to 10 November: 81,62.
2. For the purpose of calculating the entry price, the prices for cucumbers, not produced under glass, imported from third countries shall, after deduction of customs duties, be multiplied by the following conversion factors:
- from 11 February to 30 September: 1,30,
- from 1 October to 10 November: 1,00.
This Regulation shall enter into force on 11 February 1992. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 February 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 118, 20. 5. 1972, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 150, 15. 6. 1991, p. 8.
